commit message:
Merge branch 'hotfix/5.2.7' into develop

Conflicts:
CHANGELOG.md
app/build.gradle
app/src/main/java/com/boardgamegeek/io/Adapter.java
app/src/main/java/com/boardgamegeek/util/DateTimeUtils.java
Throttle cursor update in the PlayFragment to reduce 'flicker'
Display 'by' in front of the sort description in the save view dialog
Handle switching on a nullable value the way Android Studio suggests
In the player count poll, hide missing votes, but add a switch to show them again
Clean up some code in PollFragment
Show a language dependence summary on the game fragment
Let boolean play logging input fields stretch to the right edge of the form
Correct the size of the log play menu icon
Change checked and pressed colors to light blue (not medium blue)
Replace ColorsFragment's list view with a recycler view
Improve naming of PaginatedData class members
Don't show the loading row if there's no rows
Change the PaginatedArrayAdapter to inherit from the BaseAdapter
Replace CommentsFragment list view with recycler view
Add recycler view to the forum fragment
Remove old code, rename some things, and change the comment threshold
Add a recycler view to the geek lists
Use recycler view in the forums fragment
Replace ThreadFragment list view with recycler view
Replace BuddyColorsActivity list view with recycler view
Tweak Fabric and Stetho to compile in release mode
Add recycler view to GeekList fragment
Create a timestamp view to eliminate need to rebind the entire view holder
Use timestamp view in the forums
Use the timestamp view in more places and make it work for forums and non-forums
Add more logging to image downloads
Make the timestamp prefix a styled attribute
Use the TimestampView in the BuddyFragment
Use TimestampView in the PlayFragment and ProducerFragment
Add length to the play's long description
Use TimestampView in GameFragment, plus some refactoring
Prevent swiping in action mode, finish action mode when last item is deselected
Use recycler view in search results
Use recycler view in game detail fragment
Correct clicking on the GeekList header
Add a method to strip the Geek Markup from text. Use it in the geek list header
Vary the number of geek list header lines by the size of the display
Roll back about libraries to 5.6.7 until we upgrade to API 24
Stop updating the TimestampView when detached from the window (trying to avoid memory leaks)
Merge branch 'develop' of origin into develop
